competition_summary.context: competition risks; • Failure to attract and retain experienced and qualified talent, including our senior management team, or adequately plan and execute for the succession of such leaders; increased costs resulting from increased compensation and benefits packages as a result of a tighter labor market, and negative effects from restrictions on non-competes at the state and federal level; • Substantial increase in remote work among our employees, which may affect our corporate culture, productiv
